title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Type Battle 29 // Circuit City Logo Redesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142340/http:/www.typophile.com/battle29 "Type Battle 29 // Circuit City Logo Redesign")

It was announced in the news last week that [Circuit City](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142340/http:/www.circuitcity.com/), a major US electronics retailer, has filed for bankruptcy protection amid a weak economy. According to [CNN](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142340/http:/money.cnn.com/2008/11/10/news/companies/circuit_city/index.htm), the company plans to keep its remaining stores open through bankruptcy proceedings and encourages consumers to continue shopping at its stores.

Typophiles, how can you as type and/or graphic designers help Circuit City in these pressing times?

// TYPE BATTLE 29

Design a new logo (or logotype) for Circuit City. Extra points for creating additional branded examples to support your design.

Winner take all, no holds barred. May the best designer win.

// REQUIREMENTS
author: Ngoc Ngo
